cab.content: 2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I.16th February, 192?.(THIS TOCTJMBBT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY13 GOVERNMENT. )CONFIDENTIAL . \ /" CABINET. IC. P. 90 [25).i!AIRSHIP LEVELOPMENT.Copy of 1etter from Secretary, Airship Guarantee Company, to"the Pi-ime Minister.Airship Guarantee Company, Ltd., 6 Broadway,Westminster,London, S.W.I. 4-th February, 192!?.The Prime Minister,10 Downing Street, S.W.I.Sir,I have the honour to refer to the draft contract provisionally agreed between this Company and His Majesty^ Government in 1923 for the establishment of a line of Commercial Airships between England and Australia, and beg to state that I am instructed by my Board to ask if His Majesty's Government would consider a modified proposal upon a somewhat similar basis.I have the honour to be, Sir,Your obedient Servant, for AIRSHIP GUARANTEE COMPANY, Ltd. (Signed) CHRIS S. BAMBER.Secretary.
